name: ~Enchanted Tree~ Cat Furniture
description:
Pamper your Precious Kitties with this new Cat Tree from A Fantasy Forest
This Designer Cat Furniture is for those Cats that Love curling up on Super Soft Places.
Your Spoiled Kitties can laze the day away on this Lavish, Plush, Majestic Tree.  
 It is 6' tall with 2 shelves inside the Tree Trunk for them to lay on and look out the Entrance Holes or use to climb up to the Large Tree-top Platforms, it also has a space at the bottom of the Tree Trunk to hide and sleep in. This Fabulous Fairy Tale like Tree is Handcrafted with 100% wood and has Ivy growing up the front of the Tree. This Magical Cat Furniture has Luxurious Lounging on every Platform. It is covered with Luxury Faux Fur that is padded for extra softness on every Platform, from the shelves and bottom space inside of the Tree trunk up to the Large Tree-top Platforms, it even has it on the base.  Our Tree-top Platforms are much Larger 
than any other Cat Furniture out there, so they have plenty of room to stretch out and relax. 
It includes Birds, Nest/eggs and a sign for you to customize as you wish.
Cats claws tend to slide down through the Luxury Fur instead of catching on it like it can with carpet and Fabric.
The Main Platform is 44" wide and 28" deep and the Taller Platform measures approx. 30" wide by 26" deep.
 72" Tall  x  42" Wide  x  28" Deep,       100 lbs.

categories.name: Cat Trees that look like real Trees

name: ~Lil' Hickory~ Cat Tree
description:
Adorable Cat Furniture for those with limited space.
You can place it up next to a window sill so your Cats can Lounge the day away looking out, place it up on a table or other Furniture or you can even add it with a Larger Tree to create a little Forest for your Kitties to jump from one Tree to another.
 It has Super Luxurious Lounging on the Tree-top and inside the Tree Trunk.
 The Tree Trunk inside space is approx. 15" Wide by 13 1/2" Deep so even Larger cats have plenty of room to curl up.
 This cute Tree is 32" T x 35" W x 22" D  and it weighs approx. 45 lbs. 
The ~Lil' Hickory~ Tree already includes some Upgrades, like the Ficus Leaves, Padded Microsuede on the Tree-top and Super Soft Luxury Fur inside the Tree Trunk secret space. Birds and nest/eggs are also included.
It backs up flat to the wall to take up less space and is open in the rear for easy cleaning.
You can choose Light or Dark Green Microsuede.  
 
Textured Wood Exterior that is Painted to resemble Bark, Ships in a 2-piece assembly

name: ~ Hidden Hollow ~ Cat Tree
description:
Beautiful Luxury Cat Furniture for Spoiled Rotten Kitties!
These Designer Custom Cat Trees are purrrfect for climbing, hiding, sleeping, playing and lounging.
This 6' Cat Tree is handcrafted from 100% wood and created to blend in with your decor.
It has two shelves inside the hollow tree trunk that your cats can lay on and look out the entrance holes or use to climb up to the tree top lounging platforms. They can also just curl up and hide in the bottom of the tree.
It backs up flat to the wall to take up less space and is open in the rear for easy cleaning.
Each Tree comes with some birds, eggs/nest and a sign for you to customize.
Add a little Fairy door for $35.00.
The dimensions are 72" T x 42" W x 26" D    and 105 lbs.
It ships in an easy 4-piece assembly which can be put together with a wrench.
Delight yourself and your Kitties with one of these Magical Fantasy Trees!
They are available in sizes 3' - 10' tall, so there is one to fit every lifestyle.

name: ~Mountain Falls~ Cat Furniture
description:
A Realistic Look Mountain with Beautiful Cascading Waterfall. It has 3-D effect Rocks and is 5 1/2' Tall.
Your Cats can lay out on the Cliff Ledge or climb up to the Peak to Lounge. They can play and hide inside the 
Mountain Caves, or curl up and sleep in their "Den".  It is made from 100% wood and carpeted inside and out.
Mountain Falls backs up flat to the wall to take up less space and is open in the rear for easy cleaning.
Each Mountain comes with Ivy growing up the rocks and hanging greenery.
The dimensions are 66" T x 31" W x 24" D and it weighs approx. 100 lbs. 
(Ships in an easy 2-Piece Assembly)

name: ~Kitty Chateau~ Cat Condo
description:
Spoil your Kitties with their very own Mediterranean Villa! 
This Castle has 3-D effect "Stone Work" and it's own private balcony.
It comes with Shutters and a Castle Door which you can open or close.
It also includes the flowers and flower box under the window and up on top by the balcony railing and ivy growing up the castle wall.
"Kitty Chateau" is made from 100%  wood and is completely 
carpeted inside and out. It is created with colors that will blend in with your decor. Your Cats can climb up through the inside to the topbalcony to lounge, lay inside on the shelf and look out the window, or just curl up and hide and sleep in the bottom of the castle. 
The Chateau is 5' tall and it is open in the rear for easy cleaning
and backs up flat to the wall to take up less space.  
Purrrrchase this Beautiful  piece of Fantasy Cat Furniture today!
